thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Navigator Global Investments Sees HY EBITDA Up About 14 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Navigator Global Investments Sees HY EBITDA Up About 14 Pct
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Navigator Global Investments Ltd :
* ‍THERE HAS BEEN A $3.0 MILLION INCREASE IN OPERATING EXPENSES FOR H1 2018​
* ‍EXPECTS TO REPORT AN INCREASE IN EBITDA FOR HALF YEAR OF ABOUT 14%
* REDUCTION IN U.S. TAX RATE EXPECTED TO CREATE ONCE-OFF NON-CASH INCOME TAX EXPENSE ADJUSTMENT IN HY OF $36.8 MLN
* EXPECTS TO BENEFIT FROM LOWER US CORPORATE TAX ONCE IT UTILISES EXISTING NOLS & ENTERS A TAX PAYABLE POSITION​
* ‍ONCE-OFF, NON-CASH INCOME TAX EXPENSE ADJUSTMENT IN H1 TO RESULT IN STATUTORY NET OPERATING LOSS AFTER TAX FOR PERIOD​​​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
